original_text: And he brought them before the king of Moab: and they dwelt with him all the while that David was in the hold.
korean_text: 부모를 인도하여 모압 왕 앞에 나아갔더니 그들은 다윗이 요새에 있을 동안에 모압 왕과 함께 있었더라

sentences.original_text: And he brought them before the king of Moab:
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 모압 왕 앞으로 데려갔고

sentences.original_text: all the while that David was in the hold.
